column5: Hey guys - first off I'm going to get 1 thing out of the way.  Anybody who see's this thread as "spam" will have to deal with it.  I've been a part of OFC since long before I even met Dave, and as a member of OFC have every right to try and get some of the gang together, and what could be a better excuse?  Anyways - I'll be at all the show's, bust seeing as London is my closest major Center, and where I spend most of my time when I have to "run into town" I was thinking maybe we could set up a London OFC G2G on the 16th.  I was thinking everybody could hit up the FOF Live Seminars with Dave, JP (both OFNER's) and Paul Powis, then head out for a couple cold ones afterwards?  Or if you bring the family for the show maybe go somewhere that the kiddies could accompany us?  Who's in?  I've never been able to make it out to a London G2G and would love to meet some of you guys.  C'mon Brian - Let's get'er done!!!  Cheers, Ryan
LOL..  go Ryan....   I have an announcement of my own coming up!!    Lets all get out and show Dave the true support he deserves!
Im in Ryan..... let me know the details when you can...thanks  TDunn
Ryan dont be shy to come up to me and say hi I will be in Sarnia next Tuesday night for the show you cant miss me the family should also be with me for the night it will be a blast
I'm on the grave shift that night but would love to  join in on a G2G if time permits!! Let me know when & where.  Cheers
Well Ill be in ! Let me know when and where and I will be there !
I'll be visiting back Home in London then as well.  Let me know when and were and I'll try and make it.
All of the info is HERE!

Hey guys - Let's try to gather up a bit more of the london crew, and try to figure out a place to meet.  Anybody know of a place we could have a few drinks but also maybe have the family tag along.  I'm fairly certain my wife (8.5 months pregnant lol ) and 2 year old will be tagging along...?  Cheers, Ryan

I'm pretty sure the London crew usually meets at a place at the NE corner of Southdale and Wharencliff Rd, Jacks maybe?  Waaay back in the day we used to meet at Bernies, which is on Adelaide just south of Oxford (ask Roy, haha).  It certainly doesn't matter to me, I'm not even 100% sure if I can make it yet.

Final Score was where the London G2G have been recently. Since the ownership change, the best wings in town have gotten horrible (in my opinion) My vote would be to go to the Alibi on Oxford just east of Wharncliffe.  jjcanoe
I've been to alibi on several occasions...might have to book some seating with them though....any thoughts on this guys?
alibi is fine with me.  What time?
The Alibi sounds good to me.  Did you want someone to make a call Ryan?
I'll do a quick poll or role call on the board when I get a chance to get an estimate on numbers and then if you want you  can make a call, or I can doesn't make a difference to me!
Alibi sounds great to me....   Tyler
Sorry gang, as it turns out I won't be able to make it thursday.
heard the Sarnia show was awesome! Looking forward to seeing it in London tomorrow
check out the thread that TJ started I posted some pics there from Sarnia and yes it was awesome.

Hey guys!  What a week so far!  The crowds have been awesome the past two nights!  Everybody's been having a blast, there's been some awesome give aways from all the sponsors involved and we've had a lot of kids who seem genuinely interested and just plain out excited about catching the fishing fever!  Get you're family and friends out to the show tonight! I'm on my blackberry so if you guys can set up the g2g and let me know where were going when yous get here thayd be great! I have to get back to work.  Look forward to meeting you all!  Cheers
I was going to go to the Alibi at oxford and wharncliffe right after the show..... Post if this works for you...  TDunn
I thought that was the plan as well. I might not be able to make the show depending on whether or not I want sleep but will try and meet up with everyone after for sure.  Cheers.
Shows about to start.  Packed house again!
well guys, I slept in a little longer than I wanted to and looks like I won;t be able to make it out tonight. Hope everyone had a good time at the show!
